item.title: S&P 500 could tumble further and reach 5,300, says chart analyst Katie Stockton
item.description: The benchmark stock market index is coming off its worst week of the year, and chart analyst Katie Stockton sees more pain ahead.

item.title: Jefferies upgrades Airbnb as travel company expands into experiences
item.description: This year, the stock is up 2.3%, outperforming the broader market and making a slight recovery from its 18.5% loss over the past 12 months.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Apple, Airbnb, Cracker Barrel, Super Micro Computer and more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Truist upgrades Cracker Barrel to buy, encouraged by restaurant's turnaround efforts
item.description: Analyst Jake Bartlett upgraded the restaurant chain to buy from hold and set a new price target on the stock that suggests 28.4% potential upside.

item.title: Worries about Tesla sales grow as two more analysts reiterate sell ratings
item.description: UBS and Redburn Atlantic reiterated their sell ratings on Tesla ahead of the company's April delivery report and first-quarter results.
